title: $94 Worth of Bath & Body Works Products Only $40.50 Shipped
content: Through today, June 2nd, Bath & Body Works is offering a FREE Item (up to $14 value) with any purchase of $10+ both in-stores and online AND free shipping on orders over $40. Note that this excludes 3-wick candles, prism single wick candles and sale items.  If shopping online, use promo code SHOREUP at checkout. If you are heading into your local Bath & Body Works store, be sure to print this in-store coupon or show it on your mobile device.    Even better, you can score buy three, get three FREE on select body care items - no promo code needed! Consider grabbing a few and using the promo code above to score a great deal!   Check out this online deal...   Buy 6 Body Wash or Lotions $13.50 each Buy CocoShea Moisturizing Body Wash $13.50 Total after B3G3 free = $54 Use code SHOREUP (free item & free shipping on $40) Final cost $40.50 shipped - just $5.78 each! That's $94 worth of products for only $40.50 delivered to your door!       Score 50% off this Anastasia Beverly Hills Eyeshadow Palette!
